answers.answer: Hi,How  are you?  What diagnostic tests were done in the past?  Aside from diabetes, what other comorbid conditions are present?  A referral to a gastroenterologist may also be beneficial and additional work-up may need to be done. Take care and do keep us posted.

question: have had many surgeries for Pus Pockets in my stomach and they keep coming back.  I am diabetic and I don't know what else to do...can anyone tell me what's wrong because The doctors are just doing surgery on
title: infectious diseases
